summary: Analyzed 5 Edmonton extreme FWI scenarios - identified primary threats and operational thresholds

learning_events.content: severe: C2 fuel at FWI 28.0 spreads 4.87 km in 24 hours
FWI 28.0 requires resource pre-positioning - prepare for rapid deployment
2023_historical: C2 fuel at FWI 35.0 spreads 1.82 km in 24 hours

content.description: FWI 35.0 exceeds suppression capability - evacuation-only scenario

metadata.implications: Fire suppression impossible, focus on evacuation
